string_table.name: pxabnsnfns00001101101
string_table.string: Use the w, a, s, and d keys to move around the 360 degree image. Press the tab key to jump to interactive markers and hotspots.

slidelink.displaytext: Many students do not turn their cameras on during class. What might you offer as a check-in option instead of requiring cameras?
3 or 4 students actively participate in group conversations, while the rest are silent. Which communication methods could you encourage, to help the others join the conversation?
After giving a presentation, a student remarks that you must not have liked it. Which communication methods could you use after a presentation to provide immediate feedback?
A student has a question and would like to speak with you privately. Which communication methods could you choose?
You used to do a group research activity when classes met in person, and youd like to recreate the experience on Zoom. Which communication methods could you use?

resource_data.description: Here are some useful links and documents:
